class=\"stat-image\"></p>\n          <p class=\"stats\">Sent over 15,000,000 email</p>\n        </div>\n        <div class=\"w-clearfix w-col w-col-6\">\n          <p class=\"stat-image\"></p>\n <p class=\"stat-image\"></p>\n          <p class=\"stats\">Connected over 500,000 families</p>\n        </div>\n        <div class=\"w-clearfix w-col w-col-6\">\n          <p class=\"stat-image\"></p>\n          <p class=\"stats\">Counted on over 28,000 volunteers</p>\n        </div>\n      </div>\n    </div>\n  </div>\n  <div class=\"overview section\" id=\"features\">\n    <div class=\"w-container\">\n      <div class=\"featurerow w-row\">\n        <div class=\"w-col w-col-9\">\n          <h1 class=\"benefits\">Family data collection has never been EASIER.</h1>\n          <p class=\"overviewp\"><strong>How much easier would your life be if parents actually\nresponded?</strong> &nbsp;&nbsp;\n            <br>We’ve built online forms your parents will actually use! &nbsp;Once they're in your account, our click &amp; confirm system sends them an email reminder to confirm and update every year so their data is always current.&nbsp; No more nagging emails or lost notes in backpacks. &nbsp; Already have data you want to use? &nbsp;Import and get up and running in a matter of days.</p>\n        </div>\n        <div class=\"w-col w-col-3\"><img alt=\"click to confirm\" src=\"images/point_confirm.png?A5WSessionId93=9fba64c047704e1bad4186ee58166ab6\">\n        </div>\n      </div>\n      <div class=\"featurerow w-row\">\n        <div class=\"w-col w-col-3\"><img alt=\"all devices\" src=\"images/Logo_Directory_System.png?A5WSessionId93=9fba64c047704e1bad4186ee58166ab6\">\n        </div>\n        <div class=\"w-col w-col-9\">\n          <h1 class=\"benefits\">Information available anywhere you need it.</h1>\n          <p class=\"overviewp\"><strong>You’ll have the best-in-class interactive school directory.&nbsp;</strong>\n            <br> Families love our directory app to stay in contact with others throughout the school year. &nbsp;It’s super handy for class parties, arranging carpools and when you're on the go.&nbsp; Print it out or access it on your computer, tablet or phone:&nbsp; click-to-call, click-to-text and \"Map It\" are all built in. &nbsp;Additionally, the entire application is built using responsive design so yes, you can work from your iPad at the beach!</p>\n        </div>\n      </div>\n      <div class=\"featurerow w-row\">\n        <div class=\"w-col w-col-9\">\n          <h1 class=\"benefits\">Reaching your school community is seamless.</h1>\n          <p class=\"overviewp\"><strong>Target your audience and end communication overload.</strong>&nbsp;\n            <br>Combine contact lists that are always up to date with our excellent email delivery reputation and you have an amazingly effective way to reach everyone. &nbsp;Target your messages with pre-built lists by school, grade and class, members and non-members, volunteers and much more.&nbsp;&nbsp;Customize your email with graphics and links. &nbsp;</p>\n        </div>\n        <div class=\"w-col w-col-3\"><img alt=\"send email\" src=\"images/Logo_Email.png?A5WSessionId93=9fba64c047704e1bad4186ee58166ab6\">\n        </div>\n      </div>\n      <div class=\"featurerow w-row\">\n        <div class=\"w-col w-col-3\"><img alt=\"all hands on deck\" src=\"images/Logo_Volunteers.png?A5WSessionId93=9fba64c047704e1bad4186ee58166ab6\">\n        </div>\n        <div class=\"w-col w-col-9\">\n          <h1 class=\"benefits\">You’ll get more volunteers than just the “usual suspects”.&nbsp;</h1>\n          <p class=\"overviewp\"><strong>Increase volunteer participation when you reach\neveryone.</strong>\n            <br> Most groups rely on the same small group of loyal volunteers.&nbsp;&nbsp;The truth is, many parents don't volunteer because they just aren’t aware of what
